tasks.task: Purchase and use the 7-piece gardening tool set from WorkPro
subtasks: Examine the 7-piece gardening tool set from WorkPro
Identify the transplanter with 4-inch depth engravings
Identify the hand fork for aerating and mixing
Identify the weeder for precise weed removal
Identify the cultivator for loosening and spreading soil
Identify the pruning shears as a pair for trimming stems and small branches
Put on the gardening gloves included in the set
Store the tools in the convenient storage tote provided

tasks.task: Use the tools for gardening tasks
subtasks: Use the transplanter to plant seeds or seedlings at the correct depth
Use the trowel to dig holes for planting, weeding, or amending soil
Use the hand fork to aerate the soil, mix compost into the soil, or break up clumps
Use the weeder to remove weeds by their roots without disturbing surrounding plants
Use the cultivator to loosen soil around plants, incorporate fertilizers, or prepare soil for planting
Use the pruning shears to trim overgrown stems or branches, shaping plants or removing dead growth
